Module opentdk.gui

Package org.opentdk.gui.controls

package org.opentdk.gui.controls
  • Class
    Description
    ChoiceBox
    Dialog which allows to apply or skip an action, described by the content of the dialog.
    ChoiceBox.ApplyOption
    The possibilities that the user has to continue in the apply dialog.
    ChooserDialog
    Class to open the explorer/finder or similar in different modes (file chooser, directory chooser, save dialog).
    ChooserDialog.DialogType
     
    ChooserDialog.ExtensionType
    Available extension filters in the chooser dialog.
    ComboBoxFilter
    JavaFX helper class to allow to filter the combo box items depending on the edited text.
    DragAndDrop
    JavaFX class that provides drag and drop functionality between list views.
    InputDialog
    A dialog that waits for the users text input by using the TextInputDialog.
    MessageDialog
    Standard message box for information or warning issues.
    MessageDialog.MessageType
    All available designs of the MessageDialog.
    ObjectPropertyWrapper<T>
    Whenever the items of a control of javafx.scene.controls is in editing mode this class helps to display the items correctly.
    RecursiveTreeItem<T>
    Deprecated.
    TextFieldListControl
    Deprecated.
    TextInputConverter
    Whenever the items of a control of javafx.scene.controls have editable Cell this class helps to display the text input of the cells correctly.

    Example for a list cell of type text field:
    TreeTableIterator<T>
    Iterates over a TreeTable and adds values to a stack.
